content: The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision can be found in the Pagoda Realm in The New West. Specifically, right next to the Upper Pagoda Shrine. Once you spawn at the shrine, turn around and look down to find a small gap in the rocks with some enemies kneeling.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision can be found in the Pagoda Realm in The New West. Specifically, right next to the Upper Pagoda Shrine. Once you spawn at the shrine, turn around and look down to find a small gap in the rocks with some enemies kneeling.
